segments.text: The sheer obliviousness of the woman is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's literally standing in a growing puddle, oblivious to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of the overflowing sink must be quite noticeable by now, surely?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children's stool is so wobbly, it makes me genuinely nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They could both tumble down, right onto that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip and get hurt, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch all these hazards unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for damage, both to people and property, is immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets will warp, and the floor will certainly suffer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why won't she just look up from that plate for a moment?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me want to shout a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm just an observer, trapped outside the frame.
segments.speaker: PAR
